attributes.action: Rioters who are in paid employment(who don't lose their job) should be forced to contribute Financial back to the state
attributes.additional_details: Those rioters who remain in employment or later find paid work , should at source be taxed extra to pay for the repair and rebuilding of the damage they have done.this fund could be used to compensate individuals who have suffered and go towards the extra costs the taxpayer has incurred.
